data.title: Moving to Council Bluffs, IA
data.meta_description: Moving to Council Bluffs, IA? Livability helps people find their best place to live, work and visit. Find out why Council Bluffs, IA is a great place to live.
data.text:
Home > Iowa > Council Bluffs, IA

Council Bluffs, IA

Looking to move to Council Bluffs, IA? You’ve come to the right place. Livability helps people find their perfect places to live, and we’ve got everything you need to know to decide if moving to Council Bluffs, IA is right for you.

Council Bluffs, a thriving city in Southwest Iowa, offers the best of the Midwest at an affordable price. Here, you’ll find fun community events, scores of outdoor recreation activities, superb shopping and divine dining options, great job opportunities – the list could go on and on.

In short, Council Bluffs is an excellent place to call home.

Council Bluffs, nestled along the Missouri River, also boasts an excellent location where residents can enjoy the benefits of small-town living while also enjoying the big-city amenities of nearby Omaha, NE.

Thinking about relocating to Council Bluffs? To learn more, check out the new edition of Livability Greater Council Bluffs, Iowa.
